bibl.title: Factors in the Development of the Late Classical Law.
Seminar. An Annual Extraordinary Number of the Jurist

bibl.note: Magisterial address delivered at the annual convocation of the Riccobono Seminar of Roman Law, Catholic University, Washington, D.C., May 19, 1953.
Schiller A. Arthur, Factors in the Development of the Late Classical Law.
Seminar. An Annual Extraordinary Number of the Jurist 11 (1953) pp. 1-11.
